resources.string: Now you can take your Sphero for a walk!

Ready to take Sphero for a walk?

First, make sure your Sphero is paired and awake.

Then, press the button below to start the setup.

Follow the instructions as we use your camera to adjust an invisible "leash" between your phone and Sphero.

Once Sphero turns magenta, it means it is ready to follow your lead whenever you start walking!
Have fun! You can also get help or learn some tips and tricks online.
